Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for fog volumes.

NameEntry.Name: Fog: Depths / Undead Burg / Undead Parish
Fog: Catacombs / Tomb of the Giants / Great Hollow
Fog: Blighttown / Demon Ruins / Lost Izalith
Fog: New Londo Ruins / Valley of Drakes
Fog: Kiln of the First Flame / Northern Undead Asylum

fogBeginZ.Wiki: The start distance for the fog.

fogEndZ.Wiki: The end distance for the fog.

degRotW.Wiki: The strength of the fog. 0 means it is not visible.

colR.Wiki: The red component of the RGBA color used for this fog.

colG.Wiki: The green component of the RGBA color used for this fog.

colB.Wiki: The blue component of the RGBA color used for this fog.

colA.Wiki: The alpha component of the RGBA color used for this fog.
